comment: Since she's head of the Com dept, I was nervous but she is very nice and super helpful. She knows her stuff and will help in anyway she can to help. She's not easy, but she's not hard, you will have to work, but it's fun. She's big on details-proofread everything! If there's ONE mistake, you get a ZERO. Highly recommended!

She very passionate about what she is teaching! She's not hard, but she's not easy, you'll have to work a bit but you'll gain great knowledge and exp. PROOF READ...EVERYTHING! If there's even 1 typo, it's a 0.

Excellent professor. She is very knowledgeable about photography and very helpful. She wont baby you. If you do something wrong she'll let you know and then help you get it right. I liked that. She will challenge you to think so be ready to do so.

Her class was labor intensive: three papers, civic engagement, journal, letter to the editor and the final exam. But to be honest despite all the work, the class was fun, I learned a lot and it was a nice change from another lecture-only course. Be careful with the papers, follow her exact instructions and you'll be fine.

Her power points were exciting. She entertained the class. For the most part, I enjoyed her class. The only problems I had were with her grading and email. She is so stubborn and will not admit she was wrong in grading something. She also never responded to my emails. She was too busy to meet with.

She is a very knowledgeable teacher and loves what she teaches about. Her tests and projects were all easy and her in class powerpoints were always interesting. I took the class on Fridays and going to class was somewhat pointless but kind of interesting some days.

She is a very interesting teacher- has alot of knowledge in the field.  The class is great and I would suggest it to anyone.  There is alot of papers and outside work, but no tests except the final.  make sure to keep up with Journals and research topics early to make a good grade.
